categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: SW-0608 was a Zeta-class Heavy Cargo Shuttle used by Rogue One. Initially assigned to the Eadu Flight Station, it was stolen by Bodhi Rook, and destroyed by a shoretrooper grenade during the Battle of Scarif.

The significance of the designation SW-0608 was confirmed by Rogue One's screenwriter Chris Weitz when asked the question on Twitter. "SW" are the initials of the Weitz's son Sebastian Weitz, whose birthday is the 8th June.
